document.topic_text: Chamblee, Ryan, Kershaw & Anderson Attorneys Earn Spots in D Magazine’s Best Lawyers in Dallas PR Newswire DALLAS, April 21, 2016 DALLAS , April 21, 2016 /PRNewswire/ — The Dallas -based trial law firm Chamblee, Ryan, Kershaw & Anderson, PC, is pleased to announce that attorneys Peter Anderson , Bill Chamblee , Jeff Kershaw and David Walsh have been named to the list of D Magazine ‘s Best Lawyers in Dallas for 2016. To compile the list of the city’s top lawyers, D Magazine ‘s editors solicited nominations from lawyers across North Texas . A hand-picked panel of attorneys then worked with the magazine’s staff to determine the final list, which honors Dallas’ top lawyers in a range of practice areas. Mr. Anderson, Mr. Chamblee and Mr. Kershaw are recognized on this year’s list based on their work defending clients against product torts and medical liability claims, and Mr. Walsh is honored for his work in appellate law. “It’s always gratifying to have the quality of your work recognized by your peers, particularly those attorneys you regularly work with and against in the courtroom,” says Mr. Chamblee, the firm’s managing partner. “As a firm of 25 attorneys, we’re also very pleased to have a record number on this year’s list, which speaks to the overall strength of our practice and the diverse nature of the cases and clients we represent.” The complete list of Best Lawyers in Dallas is featured in the May edition of D Magazine and is available at www.dmagazine.com . Chamblee, Ryan, Kershaw & Anderson, PC, is a Dallas -based trial firm representing insurance companies, medical professionals, transportation providers, and health care institutions. Since 1998, the firm has relied on superior tactics and proven trial experience to prevail in numerous complex and significant cases. For more information, visit http://www.chambleeryan.com . For more information about Chamblee Ryan , please contact Barry Pound at 800-559-4534 or barry@androvett.com . releases/chamblee-ryan-kershaw–anderson-attorneys-earn-spots-in-d-magazines-best-lawyers-in-dallas-300255409.html SOURCE Chamblee, Ryan, Kershaw & Anderson, PC Financial Services , General News .
